Articles.Content: Im stuck at the PD Launcher.  (Steam install)  Sometime I make it to asking me if I have an account at Paradox, hit Skip.   And then a blank rectangle

Found work around for anyone else with this issue:


Deleting the launcher folder from appdata, and the PD Launcher from the game's folder, then running KSP2_x64.exe  got the ksp2 to run.

This pd launcher middle where is the problem.
just want to add that I have the same problem. the launcher appears for a few seconds, and I can click buttons, then the whole launcher window just turns into a grey, blank rectangle
Another Testing on a Windows 7 64 Bit machine (Steam version), the game runs fine if opened with the exe, but the PD launcher will never open,
